name: Xorn
damage_resistances: piercing and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

special_abilities.name: Earth Glide
special_abilities.desc: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Treasure Sense
special_abilities.desc: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
